ygData.subject: Shameless Plug
ygData.msgSnippet: My current active band Professor John and His Band has release on first CD! It is available for $15 + shipping at our website www.professorjohn.com (sorry
ygData.messageBody:
My current active band "Professor John and His Band" has release on first
CD! It is available for $15 + shipping at our website www.professorjohn.com
(sorry but I don't have any more comp copies available - they all went to
family members).

We will probably have clips available on our site - and perhaps a cut or two
on MP3.com or some such - but haven't had time to really decide on this type
of stuff yet.

This band plays New Orleans's R&B - Professor Longhair, Fats Domino type
stuff...

As far as earlier releases:

Last year I recorded a CD with Sam Burckhardt a Swing/Blues Tenor
Saxophonist. (However I'm only on four cuts) Info at his website
www.thechicagoswing.com It's an excellent CD.

My old swing band (disbanded the end of 1999) is on two compilations. "Swing
This Baby Volume 2" (available at Amazon
www.amazon.com/exec/obido...31-1704706 - only One cut.

We have two cuts on Jump n Jive Chicago - available at
www.bigchicago.com/jive.htm

I did a Big Band CD in 1994 at www.cdnow.com/cgi-bin/mse...1723120562

Lastly - I wish I knew how you could get a copy of a rock band I recorded
with "Obvious Necessity" I did two CD's with this band. Very Frank
Zappa-esque. I lost touch with the band leader - and don't know where it's
sold..

Thanks!

Slyde
aka Dan Sniderman
